name: Stylish facebook
description:
Old facebook header with drop shadow, drop shadows on profile pics, removes ads, removes news feed filter (you can comment out this part out to change what filter you like to use -- I will be working on a userscript at some point to allow quick access to the filter without it taking up the space it normally does), stretches some content that felt alone with no more ads, removes suggestions on home page (you can comment out the code to get them back).

Please email stylishfb@gmail.com with any bugs.
I'm also planning on getting a FB page and Twitter profile set up to allow some more interaction between me and my style users. Others things with Stylish Facebook are also in development to give more customization options, but that will be still be a while :).  Thanks for all the installs and support!
additional_info:
Edit(10/27/09): Completely rewrote style. Fixed bug on friends page where content was stuck to the right.

Edit(11/2/09): Fixed photos and boxes content on profile page that were stuck to right.

Edit(11/4/09): Fixed comments and textarea that were partially hidden for photo comments. Added light outer glow and some transparency to bottom bar (sectioned out so you can find and comment out if you don't like).

Edit(11/20/09): Fixed bug with little profile images next to textareas where you leave comments. Gave some bottom padding to comments.

Edit(11/22/09): Fixed comments' section for notes and videos.

Edit(11/24/09): Rounded corners and drop shadow support added for Google Chrome as userscript. Removed extraneous Firebug styles I accidentally copied in the user style.

Edit(12/10/09): Hid ads on app pages that I had forgot about.  Thanks Snake for the help!

Edit(12/20/09): Fix width on comments section for photo album page.
